title: GLOBAL MARKETS-US stocks join global rally as Nvidia results quell bubble fears, jobs data beats expectations
description: Wall Street stocks followed European shares' lead by moving sharply higher on Thursday, and benchmark Treasuries dipped as investors digested a delayed employment report and quarterly results from Nvidia, which allayed fears of an artificial intelligence bubble. All three major U.S. stock indexes advanced, with solid gains in the Magnificent Seven group of AI-adjacent momentum stocks putting the tech-heavy Nasdaq out front.

title: Elon Musk Suggests AI Will Make Work ‘Optional’ and Money 'Irrelevant'
description: Elon Musk believes artificial intelligence will soon make work “optional” and money “irrelevant” in the near future.
content:
Elon Musk believes artificial intelligence will soon make work “optional” and money “irrelevant.”
The 54-year-old xAI founder made the bold claim during an appearance at the U.S.-Saudi Investment Forum in Washington, D.C., on Wednesday, Nov. 19.
Spea... [2785 chars]

title: Transformer AI models outperform neural networks in stock market prediction, study shows
description: Like other sectors of society, artificial intelligence is fundamentally changing how investors, traders and companies make decisions in financial markets. AI models have the ability to analyze massive amounts of data while reading company filings or news headlines almost instantaneously. This is allowing for faster, more automated trading, which is making it difficult for human traders—not utilizing AI—to find an edge in the markets.

title: Sonu Nigam sings AI-powered duet with Mohammed Rafi, winning fan praise
description: Singer Sonu Nigam integrates artificial intelligence in a live tribute to Mohammed Rafi at the Sher-i-Kashmir International Convocation Complex, marking the first major event in the Valley since the Pahalgam attack and drawing enthusiastic reactions both at the venue and online.
content: Singer Sonu Nigam delivered a notable performance at the Sher-i-Kashmir International Convocation Complex in Kashmir, where he used artificial intelligence to recreate Mohammed Rafi’s voice and performed a live duet with the late singer. This event, ... [2504 chars]

title: AI Bubble Poses Risks for EMs, South African Central Banker Says
description: The boom in artificial intelligence stocks is creating a risk of a bubble, which could threaten emerging markets, South Africa’s central bank Governor Lesetja Kganyago said.
content:
The boom in artificial intelligence stocks is creating a risk of a bubble, which could threaten emerging markets, South Africa’s central bank Governor Lesetja Kganyago said.

title: AMD, Cisco and Saudi's Humain launch AI joint venture, land first major customer
description: SAN FRANCISCO ― Advanced Micro Devices, Cisco Systems and Saudi Arabian artificial intelligence startup Humain are forming a joint venture to build data centers in the Middle East and have landed their first customer, CEOs at the three companies told Reuters in an interview on Tuesday.

title: Nvidia beats quarterly earnings expectations
description: SAN FRANCISCO, California — Nvidia shares climbed on Wednesday after it beat quarterly earnings expectations on fierce demand for its sophisticated chips that power artificial intelligence (AI).
content:

title: Warner Music enters deal with startup Udio
description: WASHINGTON, D.C.– Warner Music Group and artificial intelligence (AI) startup Udio announced on Wednesday they have settled a United States copyright lawsuit and struck a deal to cooperate on a licensed artificial intelligence music creation service.

title: Google opens new AI facility in Taiwan
description: TAIPEI – Alphabet’s Google opened a new artificial intelligence (AI) infrastructure hardware engineering center in Taiwan on Thursday – its biggest outside of the United States – in what Taiwan’s president said was a show of confidence in the island as a trustworthy technology partner.
